results.title: Simvastatin attenuates radiation-induced salivary gland dysfunction in mice
results.text_hl: In our study, we investigated the radioprotective potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @DISEASE_Salivary_Gland_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012466 @@@salivary gland dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Radiation reaction recall following simvastatin therapy: a new observation.
results.text_hl: To our knowledge, recall of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@skin radiation reaction@@@ after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy has not been previously reported.

results.title: Prevention of radiation-induced mammary tumors.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@Bezafibrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, agents inducing @DISEASE_Hypobetalipoproteinemia_Familial_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C565732 @@@hypolipidemia@@@ and hypocholesterolemia respectively, cause a decrease in the @CHEMICAL_Diethylstilbestrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004054 @@@DES@@@-dependent promotion of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @DISEASE_Carcinogenesis @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@tumorigenesis@@@.
